acceptedAnswer.text: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for 1-2 day delivery at an additional cost of $15. We ship to all 50 US states and over 100 countries worldwide.

We accept returns within 30 days of purchase with original packaging and proof of purchase. Items must be unused and in resalable condition. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. Original shipping costs are non-refundable.

mainEntity.name: What payment methods do you accept?

acceptedAnswer.text: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption. We do not store credit card information on our servers.

mainEntity.name: How do I track my order?

acceptedAnswer.text: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. Log into your account and go to Order History to view real-time tracking information. Tracking updates typically appear within 24 hours of shipment.

Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping takes 7-14 business days. Customs fees and import duties may apply depending on your country's regulations and are the responsibility of the customer.

mainEntity.name: Can I change or cancel my order?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can change or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting our support team at support@example.com or calling 1-800-555-0123. Once the order has been processed and shipped, changes are no longer possible, but you can return the item using our standard return policy.

All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Extended warranty options are available at checkout. To file a warranty claim, contact our support team with your order number and description of the issue.

mainEntity.name: How do I contact customer support?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com, phone at 1-800-555-0123 (Monday-Friday 9am-6pm EST), or live chat on our website. Average response time is under 2 hours during business hours.
